"A.P.242/2/26 16:20": "What is...!"
"You did it, Sara!"
"Picking up dimensional transfer readings. Claris Claes, take them out."
"Got it!"
"They can precisely track our locations...? But that shouldn't be possible..."
"That's just what happens when two Xion clones combine forces. Thanks for the real-time adaptation, Kamits."

"〔You need not thank me.〕
〔This is for the future, after all.〕"
"Xiao!"
"Kept you waiting, huh. You've done well making it here."
"Sara?!"
"Don't worry. She's only asleep."
"It's thanks to her hard work that I'm able to be here as I am now."
"Not rewarding all of that hard work... would be rude."
"He vanished?!"
"...His readings are gone. He appears to have retreated."
"Xiao... You made it back."
"Just woken up, as someone put it. Well, I made it here in time because of that. You should be thanking Sara."
"We heard a massive explosion not too long ago. Is the vessel still intact?"
"Kashina's central core was destroyed. But the form a vessel takes is not what matters to the Dragons. Right?"

"〔Correct,〕〔what matters is the soul.〕
〔Suitable vessels〕〔exist all around us.〕"

"〔Xiao〕〔gathered the broken crystals〕
〔to create a body.〕"
"Well, to put it simply, these floating particles here are me. I created a body by gathering them up."
"And because I used the Dragoncrystals, linking up with Kamits was smooth sailing. Now we've closed the gap in our information calculation capabilities."
"Which means, our next course of action should be obvious."
"We start our counterattack."
